name: VerticalCardSwitcher
summary: VerticalCardSwitcher is library that provides UI list of cards which can be iterated by swiping up and down.
description: VerticalCardSwitcher is inspired by Shazam Discover view. It is a vertical sequence of UIViews where first UIView in sequence is always displayed and every next UIView is partially displayed. Also there is VerticalCardSwitcherDelegate which is added for VerticalCardSwitcher customization. VerticalCardSwitcher is not implemented with UICollectionView and it's contained inside parent view.
